title: Matchmaking: Why are me and my duo queue being matched against premade 5's teams?
body:
My team: top and jungle duo, mid solo, bot lane duo.
Enemy team: premade 5's team all from the same club.

i get that the matchmaker is supposed to create games where the skill level of the players is pretty even, but I just don't get how or why premade 5 teams are in the same queue as solo/duo players?

replies.body: Sounds like there were two groups of premades on your side, which meant your overall teamwork should have been pretty close to that of a 5 man premade. It honestly does kinda sucks you ended up with this kind of match though =\ .
